primary_concern: Inconsistent work completion and on-task behavior during independent work time.
strengths: Enjoys hands-on activities and science topics

patterns: Work completion drops significantly during longer independent tasks.
Often begins work but gets stuck and stops without asking for help.
More engaged during structured, shorter tasks and when teacher checks in early.
Tends to avoid assignments that feel overwhelming or unclear.
triggers_or_barriers: Difficulty breaking multi-step tasks into manageable parts.
Low initiation when unsure about expectations.
May feel embarrassed to ask for help in front of peers.

strategies_tried: Verbal reminders to stay on task
Teacher check-ins at the end of the work period

educator_constraints.time_available: Teacher can provide 1â€“2 brief check-ins during independent work time.
educator_constraints.classroom_context: General education setting with 27 students; limited one-on-one availability.
educator_constraints.materials_available: Task checklists, timers, Chromebook, small group table when available.
